quoteText:
We also use information about you, including personal data, with your consent, including:

  • To provide you with advertisements on our Service and other Third Party Services tailored to your interests.
title: The service uses your personal data for advertising

tosdr.case: The service uses your personal data for advertising
tosdr.tldr: Under section 4, information use: "We also use information about you, including personal data, with your consent, including: ... To provide you with advertisements on our Service and other Third Party Services tailored to your interests."
